Foraging memosphere

From Walkscape Walkthrough

Foraging memosphere
Type: Consumable
Value: 0
Keyword: Memosphere
Search
Keyword: 		Foraging
Properties:
Bankable:     Droppable:
Sellable:     Tradable:
Fine Version:

Inside the glass orb, you see a memory of finding a berry bush in full bloom.

The Foraging memosphere item is a consumable.

Attributes

Quality Attributes

This item has no attributes.

Ability

   Memosphere: Foraging
Effect Requirements Cooldowns Note
Grants Foraging experience. No requirement. No cooldown. Experience scales with skill level.
Experience = 20× Foraging Level
You feel the glowing orb and have a quick vision of a forest full of berries and mushrooms. You feel like you could find them more easily.

Uses

Memospheres can be used to gain experience.

Sources

Chest Drops

Chest Name Quantity Chance
(Per Roll) 		Chance
(Per Chest)† 		Odds
Adventuring guild chest 1 2.925% 11.197% ~1 in 9
Foraging chest 1-2 3.637% 13.773% ~1 in 7

†Note: Chests roll for loot multiple times.
